html:
1.18.21  9:21 pm   Is songs circle? 

      sometimes

1.18.21  9:13 pm   What made you learn a whole new skill like 3d animation with blender and not just pump out content the old fashion way?

      the old way won't run on any new computers after 2016

1.18.21  9:04 pm   Is there really a passage in "I'm best friend with my own front door" where the time signature is in 7/4 or am i just dumb?

     yes the post-sign bit is 7/4

1.18.21  9:04 pm   do you write songs tonally or do you just do what sounds good

      tonally what sounds good and also rhythmically, lyrically, melodically, conceptually, emotionally, mentally, and any other way i can think of for it to sound good

1.18.21  9:01 pm   How do you compose?

      i keep a list of things i've composed and things i have yet to compose

1.18.21  8:59 pm   Hey, how would you differentiate progressive music from jazz?

     both are both, i'm sure

     From an academic standpoint.

     i don't know that standpoint

      They both can have odd time signatures with frequent changes, similar instrumentation, long and/or free form structure.

     anything can. i'm sure i saw a sign posted somewhere that said anything can be any of those things

      However when you hear jazz you know its jazz and the same with progressive music. 

     that's not true

1.18.21  8:58 pm   i love your new song, and the video that goes with it is so pleasing and interesting to watch. what was the biggest challenge you had do overcome to make the video/song?

      the human brain has an important feature, called the infinity warning. it warns you whenever you are trying to do infinity. it says, 'warning, you are trying to do infinity, which is not possible so please stop now so your feelings don't get hurt from how impossible it would be to do infinity', well that part of my brain is unfortunately missing

1.18.21  8:57 pm   Will you ever stop making music/

      hopefully not before i have made all of it

1.18.21  8:44 pm   What is your newest song "here comes the sun" about?

      rage

1.18.21  8:43 pm   if you can describe your channel in 1 word what would it be?

      billwurtz

1.18.21  8:38 pm   whats your favorite song that you made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.18.21  8:36 pm   How do you feel about large desk fans?

      too small

1.18.21  8:30 pm   Does the music come to you first, the lyrics, or both in a big smush?

      smash

1.18.21  8:30 pm   what do you think of the z-axis

      highway to the danger zone

1.18.21  8:22 pm   What's your favorite palindrome? 

      bob

1.18.21  8:11 pm   whats damien maymdien's backstory

      the show starting unexpectedly with a jingle about grass

1.18.21  8:11 pm   how do you feel about mango flavored things

      they usually taste like something else also

1.18.21  8:10 pm   How do you spell "heresy"?

      i'm not sure

1.18.21  8:07 pm   what are you going to do now that the new video's been posted?? 

      another one

1.18.21  8:06 pm   Do you have a favorite Steely Dan album? I mean, it's ok if you don't, I'm not sure I do either. Anyway, if you do, can you articulate why?

      i'm not sure which songs are on which albums. i'm not even sure which lines are in which song. like "in the morning it won't be thyaah nooo more"

1.18.21  7:56 pm   I have no idea what to do right now. what should I do?

      how about turning over a new leaf

1.18.21  7:55 pm   what tools do you use to make your videos

      we'll see

1.18.21  7:53 pm   what's the BPM of your new song

      102

1.18.21  7:28 pm   after discovering 3d animation, did your life become more meaningful and has it been better? also i love you

      first, it got very very meaningful. so meaningful that i didn't even notice myself slipping down the rabbit hole to absolutely dangerous levels. Then gradually the meaning shifted to how the hell am i going to get out of here safely

1.18.21  7:26 pm   do you think you'll stick mostly to 3-D animation videos from now on, or would you still like to work with your more traditional animation?

      i have never done traditional animation. i might do it, but right now i am really looking for techniques that don't take until the end of the universe

1.18.21  7:25 pm   How to rage like the sun?

      just act naturally

1.18.21  7:19 pm   When do you think your next video will be after " Here comes the sun"? 

      doing it now

1.18.21  7:18 pm   What did you do last year?

      attempted to re-invent the graphics department. i kind of had no choice because the old graphics department has technically been cancelled since about 2016 but i was a bit late to the game

1.18.21  7:12 pm   So, question. Did you originally plan on making another song. Or did you decide to do it later on after you made "might quit"

      i have always planned to make as many songs as humanly possible during my lifetime. so far that plan has not changed, knock on wood

1.18.21  7:09 pm   Do you think there will ever be a time in the future when humans know everything?

     maybe the recipe for it

      When there are no mysteries left? What will we do then?

      make more mysteries, using the recipe

1.18.21  7:08 pm   what's your favorite order at Taco Bell?

      how about a franchise

1.18.21  7:05 pm   when you make a music video do you make the song or the video first?

      song

1.18.21  7:01 pm   is the icing part of the cake or is it seperate?

      it depends on how strong the adhesive is

1.18.21  7:00 pm   what are your thoughts on eggs?

      the fact that they are not a perfect sphere: that is a telltale sign of the volatility and wildness of life

1.18.21  7:00 pm   Do you dislike any of your videos? 

      i dislike them all, while also liking them. it's a sort of give and take agreement i have with myself

1.18.21  6:56 pm   what's your opinion on instant noodles?

      too fast. you blink and you miss that shit

1.18.21  6:56 pm   why are you so mysterious 

      to make up for how overwhelmingly normal i am, on a typical day

1.18.21  6:55 pm   when'd you learn how to play the piano/keyboard

     a long long time ago

      and are there any tips you could give?

      yes. ..... First decide whether or not you enjoy it. then, if you do enjoy it, then try to make sure you and the keyboard spend plentiful amounts of enjoyable time together throughout your live(s)

1.18.21  6:21 pm   Any blender tips?

      write scripts and execute them with buttons. when you have more scripts than buttons, get more buttons

1.18.21  6:16 pm   did you learn 3d modeling/animation software just for here comes the sun, or did you know your way around it before that?

      neither. answer C: i learned it so i could make many many videos

1.18.21  6:11 pm   is the sun shining on everyone ?

      that is the goal

1.18.21  6:05 pm   is the new video a goodbye to 2d?

      no. it's a plea for 2D to come back and comfort me, and help me with my night terrors

1.18.21  6:03 pm   can you give the next question a direct, non sage like reply

      sure

1.18.21  6:02 pm   Is that true? God returned to his subjects while adding a third axis to the dimension of his past masterpieces to propagate the philosophy of his new art? I can't believe it! OwO

      right, and then no one ever heard from him again

1.18.21  6:02 pm   Have you made a blender donut, and if so, can we see it?

      sure

1.18.21  6:01 pm   How many layers is enough layers?

      1

1.18.21  5:57 pm   what does the default cube in blender taste like

      euclid

1.18.21  5:03 pm   have you ever been asked a question that you answered "perhaps"?

      no, i only use that word with other words after it

1.18.21  5:03 pm   Do you like sports?

      i must admit i like the ball

1.18.21  5:01 pm   What do you think about your song new canaan?

     it's ok

     Are you ever gonna make one like it again?

      yes. there are 3 or 4 very similar ones written around the same time, under similar circumstances. i will make those ones
